ing: 5 tablespoons pressurized canned Cheddar cheese spread
des: "The cute spiders make great Halloween snacks for a preschool party! Kids can help make them too. The spray cheese can also be substituted with peanut butter."
ins: Squirt 10 crackers evenly with about 1/2 tablespoon of cheese spread; top each cracker with another to make sandwiches. Poke 6 pretzel sticks into the cheese, 3 on each side, to make 6 legs. Squirt two dots of cheese onto the top of the sandwich, and stick 2 raisin eyes on each snack.
